data.actual_result: Clicking the notifications, it just opens your app, and make the notification disappear without sending you where it should.
data.expected_result: Clicking the notifications you should be redirected to the place from where the notifications came.
data.short_description: Pressing the notifications users are not sent to the place from the channel and server the notifications came
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone to ping you while you're not in app (or get notifications from messages. Any notifications) - Click the notification - Observe it just opens the app where you left when you closed it. - Observe that you are not sent in the channel and server from where the notifications came.
